messages.original_text: Binance just announced a new listing! Get ready for the next big pump!
messages.translated_text: Binance baru sahaja mengumumkan penyenaraian baharu! Bersedia untuk kenaikan besar yang seterusnya!

messages.original_text: KuCoin volume surges after the latest market correction.
messages.translated_text: Volum KuCoin melonjak selepas pembetulan pasaran terbaru.

messages.original_text: Another interesting signal: watch out for activity on Bybit and Gate.io.
messages.translated_text: Satu lagi isyarat menarik: perhatikan aktiviti di Bybit dan Gate.io.

messages.original_text: The market seems quiet today, no major moves detected.
messages.translated_text: Pasaran kelihatan tenang hari ini, tiada pergerakan besar dikesan.
